title: AmericanMade89
author: AmericanMade89
content: Please take this seriously and only respond if youâ€™re like minded. Thanks.As a Computer Hardware, Network, Security, and Software Designer, Engineer, and Researcher, I'm thrilled to introduce a groundbreaking project that has the potential to reshape the AI landscape. But here's the exciting part - if this project goes the way it's intended, we won't just achieve financial prosperity; we can reach even greater heights!Let me present our extraordinary AI assistant project, poised to revolutionize the way we interact with technology. Currently, I'm driving this initiative, but I believe that by assembling a team of brilliant minds, we can amplify its impact and unlock incredible possibilities!Imagine an AI assistant that not only simplifies your daily tasks but also adapts to your preferences, anticipates your needs, and provides personalized recommendations. Our vision is to create an assistant that seamlessly integrates into your life, making it smarter, more efficient, and remarkably intuitive.Now, why should you consider joining me on this exhilarating journey? As a Computer Hardware, Network, Security, and Software Designer, Engineer, or Researcher, your expertise will be instrumental in shaping the future of AI assistants. Together, we will push the boundaries of technology and create an unrivaled user experience.But let's not limit our aspirations to financial success alone. If this project unfolds as intended, we have the potential to achieve even more. By delivering an exceptional AI assistant, we can make a significant impact on the lives of millions, transforming how they interact with technology and improving their overall well-being.Privacy and security are of paramount importance to us. We are committed to employing state-of-the-art measures to protect your data and ensure absolute integrity. Trust is the foundation of our journey, and we will spare no effort to maintain your privacy and security.If you're a Computer Hardware, Network, Security, and Software Designer, Engineer, or Researcher with a passion for AI, or a talented UI/UX expert, this project is tailor-made for you! Let's seize this opportunity to create something extraordinary, disrupt the industry, and unlock a world of possibilities that extend far beyond financial gains.If you're interested in joining my team or partnering with me in this endeavor, please leave a comment below or send me a private message. Together, we'll embark on a thrilling journey to shape the future of AI, redefine technology, and make a lasting impact on the world.Stay tuned for more updates, exciting developments, and let's prepare to revolutionize the realm of personal assistants. This project is not just about financial success; it's about pushing boundaries, making a difference, and reaching for the stars!Brandon D.

comments.author: Fardoche
comments.body: How relevant is your idea comparing with other big tech companies who have established larger solutions?Also, will it be able to provide adapted commercial needs to facilitate mandatory requirements?If so, i might be interested sharing some thoughts with you!

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Quote from: AmericanMade89 on October 07, 2023, 02:42:14 PMHello, fellow Bitcoin enthusiasts!I am a very well known YouTube content creator doing a social experiment.Quote from: AmericanMade89 on October 07, 2023, 10:40:30 AMPlease take this seriously and only respond if youâ€™re like minded. Thanks.As a Computer Hardware, Network, Security, and Software Designer, Engineer, and Researcher, SnipThis project is not just about financial success; it's about pushing boundaries, making a difference, and reaching for the stars!Brandon D.So Brandon, tell us how many jobs and talents you have other than those mentioned above? Looks like you are an astronomer as well, just make sure don't go far into the stars. LolÂ  Â you really think you can earn your gambling money by scamming people here? Around these woods you'll find nothing but giant trolls.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: A long article, more than 1000 characters, and we did not spoil anything or obtain useful information. This is enough reason to abandon your project. Try to give a simple idea, without meaningless details and a brief explanation of your idea.You will not get any support because you are collecting several terms without adding anything useful.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: So astronaut Brandon, sir. What is your opinion aboutÂ  the concept of temporal displacement occurringÂ  in quantum states of electrons in order to fetch the final result of a process which hasn't been initiated yet? Wouldn't that possibility make future AI technology unstoppable if we manage to implement such capability and integrate it with AI neurons?Â  I'm eagerly awaiting your professional opinion on the subject.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: Quote from: AmericanMade89 on October 10, 2023, 08:57:29 AMQuote from: hugeblack on October 08, 2023, 08:45:26 AMA long article, more than 1000 characters, and we did not spoil anything or obtain useful information. You clearly arenâ€™t nearly qualified. With that being said your opinion means as much as you mean. Nothing . I wish you the best and Iâ€™m truly sorry you canâ€™t comprehend. Take care buddy .This reply is a typical response from a narcissistic and arrogant individual and I do not care if you have a Bachelor's degree or a Honours or aÂ  Master's degree and lots of Doctoral degrees.... you are a human just like all of us. I also have several qualifications and I have done lots of successful projects, but I will never look down on other people like you did. Yes, the latest hype in the IT industry are surely AI, but most new companies just join like sheep. Do we need AI to take over our lives and our jobs? I consulted in a project for the medical industry, where AI are involved ...and it worked like a charm.... but several people lost their jobs. AI can solve a lot of problems and it can make life very convenient... but there are disadvantages and risks that should not be ignored. Sorry, even if your project are one of the most innovative and groundbreaking out there.... I cannot work with people with an attitude like yours.

I cannot work with people with an attitude like yours.Â  In case you missed it, one of the OP's quotes is on my post at #3, that topic got nuked because he was asking people to send him $50 in BTC and if 10 or 100 people do that he would perform some magic, he was pretending to be mr beast doing social experiment. LolOp is just a scamming gambling addict, I'm sure the OP was written by AI.Â  The reason I didn't report it or it's not deleted is because it's "on topic" while the other thread was not.He is an astronaut who rolls down in the deep by nights, and a gambler hustling people by days. ðŸ˜‰

comments.author: JungleCasino
comments.body: Your idea of an AI assistant that seamlessly integrates into our lives, anticipating and adapting to our individual needs and preferences, is exactly what I believe to be the next logical and necessary step in the evolution of AI technology. I am firmly convinced that such innovations will have a profound and positive impact, transforming our daily experience and improving our overall well-being. I am currently involved in another project, but I will follow you.

comments.author: JungleCasino
comments.body: Why such aggression? Proposing a fair casino (which is not yet active for now) is nothing shameful. My signature indeed matches my project, which is to offer a verifiable and honest Casino with low margins, in which players can invest to share the profits. This does not prevent me from responding personally from my account on your post, and this is by no means advertising because I would not find the audience interested in gambling here anyway. Your signature could also be seen as advertising... Innovation and improvement of existing services are essential in all sectors, including the gaming industry. If we can bring about positive changes and offer a platform that provides a fairer and more transparent gaming experience, it could be beneficial for all participants. I wish you the best in your endeavors, but know that aggression is likely to work against you.

comments.author: digaran
